author: newsr.in
title: Motorola Moto X Style Coming to India on October 8 - newsR
text: Motorola has teased the upcoming release of Moto X Style in the last couple of days. The US-based handset maker has a partnership with Flipkart for the distribution of its most popular Android smartphones, which apparently will extend over the Moto X Style as well. Although there were rumors claiming Motorola could launch its future Android smartphones through multiple retailers across the country, it looks like the Flipkart deal is too good to be dropped yet.
